title: Strange Gifting Error..
body:
Tried gifting a friend a skin and every time i attempt to finalize it i get this error message (without quotes),

"An Error Has Occured"

"exchange.malformedRequest" 

I have 0 clue what that's supposed to even mean or what's causing it.
If anyone has any insight or experience with this and could help me find out how to fix it would be appreciated!

 P.S. All requirements are met and i'm 99% sure that's not the issue

replies.body: Looking into this, it looks like a gift was successfully sent.  This error is usually caused by [general restrictions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) with gifting, like being friends for a long enough amount of time.  is everything okay now?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ug9PcWQR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-05T15:27:05.303+0000)
>
> Looking into this, it looks like a gift was successfully sent.  This error is usually caused by [general restrictions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) with gifting, like being friends for a long enough amount of time.  is everything okay now?

Not sure to be honest. I haven't lost any rp for it yet and my friend hasn't been on yet to confirm if she's gotten it so i can't say completely.
Continuing to attempt gifting it results in the same error over and over, yet i can gift others fine.
Thanks for the swift reply though it is appreciated. 
P.S we've been friends for awhile and requirements are met

Thanks for the update!  There might be a method of payment issue or something else entirely, but I can't say for sure.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look and help.  We'll respond asap!
its because the person ur trying to gift has been banned for 14 days 4 some reason so wait 14 days and then you can gift them wot ur trying to gift

i am getting the same result. however my account is on a 14 day suspension. could that play a role in this? I hope riot doesnt charge me because i tried a couple times but i got the same result (error).
Did they charge you? and if so did they charge all the times you tried?
